title: Understanding the Type of Analysis
text: In analytical chemistry, different types of analyses are used to achieve specific goals. Consider what the primary goal is when developing a method to detect trace amounts of a substance.

title: Types of Analysis in Analytical Chemistry
text: There are several types of analyses in analytical chemistry, including qualitative, quantitative, characterization, and fundamental. Each serves a different purpose.

title: Focus on Method Development
text: When the goal is to develop a new method, the analysis is often focused on understanding and improving the technique itself rather than measuring or identifying a specific sample.

title: Identifying the Correct Type of Analysis
text: Given the goal of developing a new method to detect trace lead in water, which type of analysis is most appropriate?
